tool_description: Creates comprehensive vehicle profiles with specifications, maintenance requirements, and baseline service intervals from manufacturer data.
error_messages: Invalid vehicle year: Year must be between 1900 and current year plus 1.
Unsupported engine type: Use one of [gasoline, diesel, hybrid, electric].
Invalid mileage: Mileage must be a non-negative integer.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for purchase_date.
Missing manufacturer data: Unable to find maintenance specifications for the given make/model/year combination.
usage: Provide vehicle identification details and current status. The tool creates a complete vehicle profile with manufacturer-recommended maintenance intervals and specifications.

maintenance_categories.description: List of applicable maintenance categories for this vehicle
